TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlXmlReader extends System.Xaml.XamlReader implements class System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo
Public Class XamlXmlReader Inherits XamlReader Implements IXamlLineInfo
public ref class XamlXmlReader : System::Xaml::XamlReader, System::Xaml::IXamlLineInfo

summary.span: 使用 中介处理 XML 文件中的 XAML 标记，并生成 XAML 节点流。

span.span: Processes XAML markup from XML files by using an intermediary, and produces a XAML node stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造时、是必需的。When you construct a , an is required. 此设计的目的是使用建立[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]Api 用于 XML 处理以处理数据流输入获取的流从文件中，依次类推。The purpose of this design is to use established [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] APIs for XML processing in order to handle stream input, to obtain a stream from a file, and so on. 是标准的加载路径 XAML 操作的第一个组件，并通过合并以及通过多个现有的框架 XAML 实现用于 XAML 加载。 is the first component of the standard load path for XAML operations and is incorporated by as well as by several existing framework XAML implementations for loading XAML.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

value.span: 如果行信息可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if line information is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是的一部分实现。This property is part of the implementation. 结果部分基于用来初始化此读取器设置。The result is partially based on the reader settings that were used to initialize this .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值报告 XAML 节点流中的读取器位置是否位于文件结尾。

span.span: Gets a value that reports whether the reader position in the XAML node stream is at end-of-file.

value.span: 如果位置在节点流的概念上的文件末尾，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the position is at the conceptual end-of-file in the node stream; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你当前使用的子树读取器，子树读取器报告后退出边界的子树。If you are currently using a subtree reader, the subtree reader reports after exiting the bounds of the subtree. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取要报告的行号。

The line number to report.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是的一部分实现。This property is part of the implementation. 节点类型， ， ，或可以返回的行号。Node types of , , , or can return a line number. 其他节点类型返回值为 0。Other node types return a value of 0. 所有节点类型都返回 0，如果是`false`。All node types return 0 if is `false`.

value.span: 当前成员；如果当前读取器位置不在成员上，则为 。

span.span: The current member; or , if the current reader position is not on a member.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration Namespace { get; }
.property instance class System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration Namespace
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Namespace As NamespaceDeclaration
public: virtual property System::Xaml::NamespaceDeclaration ^ Namespace { System::Xaml::NamespaceDeclaration ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从当前节点中获取 XAML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets the XAML namespace from the current node.

value.span: 如果可用，则为当前节点中的 XAML 命名空间；否则为 。

span.span: The XAML namespace from the current node, if it is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅有一个非 null 结果，如果的当前位置是。This property only has a non-null result if the of the current position is . 此属性不会报告适用于对象或概括的作用域的成员的 XAML 命名空间。This property does not report the XAML namespace that applies to objects or members in a general scoping sense. 如果需要针对特定操作，您的实现应缓存 XAML 命名空间信息。Your implementation should cache XAML namespace information if you need it for specific operations. 默认操作，涉及加载的 XAML 架构上下文，活动的 XAML 命名空间内部缓存的 XAML 编写器实现。For default operations that involve the loaded XAML schema context, the acting XAML namespace is internally cached by XAML writer implementations.

span.span: Gets the type of the current node.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Read ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Read() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read () As Boolean
public: override bool Read();

summary.span: 提供所加载的源中的下一个 XAML 节点（如果 XAML 节点可用）。

span.span: Provides the next XAML node from the loaded source, if a XAML node is available.

returns.span: 如果某节点可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a node is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 节点其中返回`false`也会返回`true`为。A node where returns `false` also returns `true` for . 调用通常具有向前推进的副作用或。Calling generally has the side effect of advancing the or . 在调用该下一步操作和获取`true`结果通常是检查。The next operation after calling and getting a `true` result is typically to check . 有关 XAML 节点流概念的详细信息，请参阅[了解 XAML 节点流结构和概念](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/understanding-xaml-node-stream-structures-and-concepts.md)。For more information about XAML node stream concepts, see [Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/understanding-xaml-node-stream-structures-and-concepts.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext SchemaContext { get; }
.property instance class System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext SchemaContext
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SchemaContext As XamlSchemaContext
public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ SchemaContext { System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象提供信息集的架构信息。

span.span: Gets an object that provides schema information for the information set.

value.span: 一个对象，该对象提供信息集的架构信息。

span.span: An object that provides schema information for the information set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值是默认 XAML 架构上下文或作为构造函数的信息提供专门派生的 XAML 架构上下文。This value is either the default XAML schema context or a specifically derived XAML schema context that is provided as constructor information. 架构上下文会影响 XAML 处理行为的许多方面。Schema context affects many aspects of XAML processing behavior. 具体而言，任何关联的编写器通常使用读取器。In particular, the of the reader is generally used by any associated writer.
